name: dashboard-gantt-chart
description: Project timeline Gantt chart with task groups, progress bars, dependency arrows, today marker, and day/week/month views. Pure React + SVG, no external chart library.
postMessage:
Install shadcn deps: npx shadcn@latest add card badge button toggle-group tooltip scroll-area avatar
Import: import { GanttChart } from '@/components/dashboard-gantt-chart'
